title: Entertainment Company "LEVEL-5 abby Inc." Bringing The Best Of Japanese Children's Entertainment To The Global Market; Akihiro Hino At The Helm
text:
Information contained on this page is provided by an independent third-party content provider. WorldNow and this Station make no warranties or representations in connection therewith. If you have any questions or comments about this page please contact pressreleases@worldnow.com .
SOURCE LEVEL-5 abby Inc.
First Out Are Mega-Hits YO-KAI WATCH™, Little Battlers eXperience™; Newly Formed, Privately Held Global Company Funded By LEVEL-5 Inc. and Dentsu Inc.
SANTA MONICA, Calif. , Oct. 1, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- A new North American-headquartered global entertainment company – LEVEL-5 abby Inc. – has been formed to bring the best of Japanese children's entertainment across all platforms and channels, it was announced today by Mr. Akihiro Hino , the newly formed company's President and CEO.
Experience the interactive Multimedia News Release here: http://www.multivu.com/players/English/7643951-level-5-abby-yo-kai-watch/
LEVEL-5 abby will build upon the unique approach to entertainment development pioneered by Hino, as Founder, President and CEO of LEVEL-5 Inc., the renowned Japanese entertainment company with multiple mega-hits now under its belt. Hino's innovative approach to storytelling evolved first during his years as a game creator, and it has now become the hallmark of his company's work.
"LEVEL-5 has built its reputation on developing broadly popular, family-oriented and heartwarming titles, including Professor Layton™, Inazuma Eleven™, Ni No Kuni™ and Little Battlers eXperience™ (LBX™) ," said Hino. "With YO-KAI WATCH™ , the LEVEL-5 team took everything we had learned to date, and used that accumulated knowledge for our deep-dive, immersive exploration into the day-to-day realities of today's kids. We listened carefully to what they had to say, what they care about, think about, worry about. From this foundation, a multi-media / multi-verse was imagined – a robust world that is so nuanced and authentic, it is highly relatable and believable. We then carry this richly developed world into multiple touch-points -- gaming, TV, toys, publishing, events, the internet and social channels."
Heading up the day-to-day operations is Ms. Yukari Hayakawa , Chief Operating Officer. Reporting directly to Hino, Hayakawa is spearheading the global roll-out of the company's mega-hit IPs – YO-KAI WATCH ™ premiering October 5 th , Little Battlers eXperience™ (LBX™) and SNACK WORLD™ , a new multi-media franchise currently in production for 2016. The North American roll-out of the YO-KAI WATCH franchise includes:
In the United States , YO-KAI WATCH premieres on Disney XD on Monday, October 5 th , 2015 from 5-5:30 ET /PT, with a new episode premiering each night during the initial week. In Canada , the program will premiere on TELETOON on October 10 th at 2:00 p.m. ET /PT. VIZ Media launches their manga throughout North America on November 3 rd . The North American video game launches exclusively on Nintendo 3DS ™ on November 6 th . In January 2016 , Hasbro will launch its highly anticipated toy line in North America . Commenting on the company launch, Hayakawa said, "It's exciting to be part of an initiative that values out-of-the-box thinking, and to be part of a company willing to put fresh ideas to the test, working in close, collaborative partnerships with best-in-class partners. Early exposure of the franchise in the North American market has been very well received, and we are looking forward to introducing this beloved production to new audiences."
LEVEL-5 abby is funded by Japanese entertainment and advertising giants LEVEL-5 Inc. and Dentsu Inc. In addition to his new role at the helm of LEVEL-5 abby , Hino also currently serves as Founder, President and CEO of LEVEL-5, Inc.
To learn more, please visit:
LEVEL-5 abby Inc. corporate website: http://www.level5.co.jp/abby/
Yo-kai World website: http://www.yo-kai-world.com
Disney XD website: http://disneyxd.disney.com/yokai-watch
TELETOON website : http://www.teletoon.com/en/tv/yo-kai-watch
YO-KAI WATCH YouTube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/c/YOKAIWATCH
YO-KAI WATCH Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/YokaiWatchOfficial
YO-KAI WATCH Twitter: https://twitter.com/YokaiWatchNews
About YO-KAI WATCH™
YO-KAI WATCH™ is a cross-media universe, following the hilarious misadventures of an average human boy and his involvement with the mischievous Yo-kai all around him. Our young hero obtains a special watch, empowering him to discover and summon the mysterious Yo-kai, befriend them and then work together to solve everyday problems... problems that are often cause by other trouble-making Yo-kai! Discover the adventures of Nate and his Yo-kai companions via video game, animated comedy series, comics, toys and video on demand.
About LEVEL-5 abby Inc.
Multi-media entertainment company LEVEL-5 abby Inc. creates, produces and distributes highly engaging content for children, adults and game/anime fans worldwide. The company mission is to bring its universally themed popular game and animation content from Japan to fans globally, across all platforms and all devices. LEVEL-5 abby maintains a strong commitment to maintaining its position on the frontier where the newest technologies and great story telling intersect. The company's tentpole franchises – YO-KAI WATCH™ , Little Battler's eXperience™ (LBX™) and SNACK WORLD™ , the latter currently in production– are debuting before western audiences via multiple touch points, including animation, toys, comics, music, and live entertainment. As the company expands, LEVEL-5 abby will also develop original entertainment content designed specifically for Western and global markets. LEVEL-5 abby Inc. is headquartered in Santa Monica , CA. To learn more, please visit www.level5.co.jp/abby .
